description: This source file defines a React functional component called Settings, which provides a user interface for theme preferences, connection configurations (API and WebSocket URLs), and notes related to backend endpoints. It integrates with application state via custom hook useAppState and retrieves configuration URLs from imported functions.

methods.name: Settings()
methods.description: Functional React component that renders the settings page for theme and connection information, with interactive elements for toggling theme and displaying configuration details.
